version_name: 3.0.1- Two new themes: ‘Irene’
3.0.2- Several bug fixes and improvements.Version 3.0.1- Two new themes: ‘Irene’
3.0.3- Fixed a bug that caused a crash when trying to create a new folder while using the app in Standalone mode.- Larger font sizes now available in the main article view.- Where possible

3.0.4- Addressed some of the issues related to Syncing Error 429 & 520.- Fixed some issues with search results never showing up for certain URLs.- Other minor bug fixes & improvements.Version 3.0.3- Fixed a bug that caused a crash when trying to create a
3.0.5- This update should get rid of Feedly-Syncing Errors 429 & 520. If you're still seeing those errors
3.0.6- Added ability to download starred items of Feeds you’re no longer subscribed to (which you may have starred while you were still subscribed)

3.0.7- Added Spanish localisations.- Added ability to disable confirmation of ‘Mark all as read’ in article lists. This allows for quick (single action) mark all as read. Please go to Settings > Article Options > Mark all as read
3.0.8- Added the ability to customise the maximum number of lines used by article previews in article lists. Please go to Settings > Article Options > Preview

3.0.9- Added support for accent/cedilla/diacritic-insensitivity to in-app article search- Updated Localisations- Several other minor bug fixes & improvements.Major 3.0 update..- New sync services: FeedHQ
3.0.10- Added the ability to set the default themes applied by the fast-theme-switching-gesture (rotational/dimmer gesture). Please go to Settings > Theme
3.0.11- Fixed ‘Mark as read on scroll’ for VoiceOver users (It should now work as it used to before 3.0.9
3.0.12- Added support for syncing with Feedbin.- Minor bug fixes & improvementsMajor 3.0 update..- New sync services: FeedHQ

3.0.13- Added support for syncing with Newsblur.- Added ability to automatically switch themes based on your display brightness. Please go to Settings > Theme to configure this.- Minor bug fixes & improvementsMajor 3.0 update..- New sync services: FeedHQ

3.0.35- ‘Mark all above as read’ while filtered by Unread

3.0.36- Added cumulative counts for Inoreader Active Searches & Tags at root level.- Added granular mark as read options to mark articles older than a specific time as read. Tap & hold the 'Mark all as read' button in the top right corner in article lists
